article: china reported a new sars death friday and warned officials not to hide cases of the disease , while leaders in hard-hit hong kong geared up for a massive clean-up targeting the territory 's back alleys where germs might fester .
abstract: sars claims another life in china ; researchers worldwide fine tune tests for the virus
